roleset.name: deflect an attack
roleset.note: PARRY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'parry' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from parry.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: parry, dodge, spin, thrust
example.text: The burning question is whether the new chief can parry Mr. Icahn without being pushed into unwelcome moves.
example.arg: without being pushed into unwelcome moves

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Lawmakers have n't publicly raised the possibility of renewing military aid to the Contras , and President Bush parried the question at a news conference here Saturday , saying only that `` if there 's an all - out military offensive , that 's going to change the equation 180 degrees . ''
example.arg: saying only that `` if there 's an all - out military offensive , that 's going to change the equation 180 degrees
